    Abraham Junkai Huang

    Hi there! I’m a senior year undergraduate at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), majoring in Computer Science & Mathematics. My research interests lie at the intersection of computer vision, deep learning and robotics. I’m currently working on 3D vision research topics regarding Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), supervised by Prof. Chi-Keung Tang and Prof. Yu-Wing Tai.
